author: Buddha
message: Your work is to discover your world and then with all your heart give yourself to it.
title: Thought of the day

author: Daisaku Ikeda
message: The person who lives life fully, glowing with life's energy, is the person who lives a successful life.
title: Thought of the day

author: Richard Bach
message: Don't turn away from possible futures before you're certain you don't have anything to learn from them.
title: Thought of the day

author: David Brinkley
message: A successful person is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks that others throw at him or her.
title: Thought of the day
